alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Holt; Nodaway (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:51AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Atchison, northwestern Holt and northwestern Nodaway Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 651 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Elliott to near Nebraska City to near Sterling. Movement was south at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tarkio, Rock Port, Fairfax, Burlington Junction, Hopkins, Craig, Clearmont, Elmo, Westboro, Watson, Quitman, Corning, Phelps City and Indian Cave State Park. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 91 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for northwestern Missouri.
